text: The crimes there are diverse, but the penalty is one, always the same. The condemned is put in an endless tunnel, left between the rails of a railroad track. The convict knows what's coming and runs away. Get out of here. He doesn't consider any other alternative. But running away is impossible because the tunnel is endless. The condemned runs and runs, until he loses his breath, even his life. It can be said, however, that no train has ever run on those tracks. FIN
title: La sanción
author: Jacques Sternberg
